resources.string: This name will be used while sending list to a shop or while chatting with a shopkeeper.This is not a username.

Walkover brings an all new way for shopping from your nearby stores now you don't need to search for a product by going to each and every shop instead you can just tap to Walkover application,type in product name and you will get suggestion of where you can find the product.
It gives you an option to send virtual list of items to shopkeeper and can get the order after it's ready. You can query for the availability of a product by using the chat facility.
Walkover will bring you the ease which will transform the way you do shopping from local shops.
An interconnection of local shops you will get the information on your smart phone screens.
Name must not contain numbers or special characters (1–9,.,*,-,_,+,#,@..etc)
Have some suggestions in your mind?
For better results and filtering location is needed please allow access to device location Go to Settings->Permission->enable location
